_aChangeLog.text: Made some jump on stage 3 possible. third version because im a faggot and barely test my shit
Stage 2: Added playerclips on the stairs
Stage 3: Changed some jumps where you had to jump twice on them
Stage 4: Made some blocks have no collision to be less anonying
Stage 5: Changed some textures, removed unnecessary playerclips, tweaked boosters, made ceiling higher

_sText: **THIS VERSION IS SHIT** This port turned out shit since i'm not very good at bhop. If anyone is very good at bhop and decent at mapping and wants to redo this map, here are the .vmf files of every version. ------------------------------- This is a port of the hardest Quake defrag map, only one person has completed it. gnj-finaltorture Map is about 10 minutes long with no checkpoints. Don't even bother trying to complete this on scroll, this is map is autohop exclusive. I'd be surprised if anyone completes this. Good luck.
